about_the_game:
"Dreamy Duels" is a card game inspired by the "Touhou Project" universe and various classic card games. In this game, you can also use the card editor to create unique custom cards, building a vibrant and diverse card game world with other players.

Game Content


In "Dreamy Duels", you can build your deck with over 100 characters from Gensokyo, then play with CPU or with other players in a game similar to most popular trading card games. During Early Access, you can build decks with 6 character classes without needing to collect anything:

Custom Cards


The card editor in "Dreamy Duels" is user-friendly and powerful, allowing for editing by simply clicking on elements of the card's appearance for a WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) experience.



The visual node system enables the arrangement and combination of all effects in the game, creating complex cards.

Online Battles


"Dreamy Duels" supports players battling in server lobbies. Here, you can not only use official cards but also your own creations to compete against other players. You'll also encounter unknown cards created by other players. Are you ready to explore this card universe built by everyone?

Future Plans


Unlike most card games, "Dreamy Duels" aims to create a player-centric game ecosystem. We will do our utmost to support player creativity and sharing.

In the future, we will continue to refine the game's editor, such as adding custom sound effects, special effects, and custom game rules. Similarly, we will also introduce corresponding official content based on this, such as a tactical battle mode and PVE mode.

To foster a healthy ecosystem for player-created content, we will launch a dedicated battle mode for custom cards——Homebrew Mode. In this mode, players can rate the custom cards they have battled against. The ratings received by the cards will determine their influence in the environment, allowing creators to better receive player feedback.

Moreover, we will consistently release the Android version of "Dreamy Duels" for free, hoping to allow more players to join our game through various platforms. In the future, we will also introduce some in-game purchase content, enabling players to buy game content in their preferred way of payment.

We look forward to your support to help the "Dreamy Duels" community flourish!

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the cards and character illustrations may contain suggestive clothing and poses, but overall, it remains a cute card game.
